title: Global Day of Coderetreat 2014 - Fairfax, VA, USA
description:
We are sorry, but we have had to cancel the Fairfax, VA edition of GDCR; our moderator injured his foot and is in the hospital. 
If you are still interested, we suggest checking out the nearby Arlington, VA event:Â  http://www.meetup.com/DC-Software-Craftsmanship/events/163724242/ 
We apologize for any inconvenience.
